page.title: 09FUND RAISING,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: The children of Sparsholt Primary School take part in a sponsored walk around Crab Wood each year.The walk first took place in 1975 when the school staff and parents decided that it would be a good way to raise money for the school. We have to take a sponsor form home and get people to sponsor us for every lap we walk.In 1985 the walk took place as usual.Each lap is about half a mile and we do sixteen laps if possible.This year we had to walk through scattered logs and down leafy slopes.At the end of the walk we have two hotdogs and a drink of orange squash. This year the children in the school raised Â£397.
